content.detailedDescription:
It started around 10:20pm when our dog need to go outside, so i grabbed her leash and mindlessly opened the door, but as i looked outside my eye was directed immediately to a amber/gold coloered light which distenctly stuck out from the typical black sky strewn with stars because of its brightness and i have never seen any star that color. the light lasted only around 10 sec. then started to dim then completely dissappeared. i was still dumb-founded and standing on the porch holding my dog my the collar, so i rushed to chain her up because i didn't want to miss something else. so i run up onto the porch agian and ran inside to shut of the outside light so that i could see clearly. as soon as i stepped outside agian i noticed a series of white lights moving towards me from the south east; and the lights were not like the distinct lights that are stationary on a jets wings or something like that, they moved and flashed very erraticly with no pattren but seemed to be connected to something. at one point, the object appeared to turn itself vertical because the lights were suddenly on top of one another oppossed to being in a horizontial postion, and it did this for 5 seconds approx. then went horizontial agian. it finally came completely over our house and it apperaed to be in a triangle formation with 3 white lights on the corners (which stopped blinking manically after passing over the house)and there was a previously unseen red light in the center of the craft on what i'm assuming was its belly. i watched the craft till it dissappered to the north. since i had walked around the house to watch it leave i saw the amber light appear again this time from the same place i originally saw the triangle object. it only appeared for 6 seconds approx. then blinked out again. the triangle could have easily been a stealth bomber though because there was a slight roar as it passed, but that dosen't and cannot explain the random flashing and erratic movement and shifting of the lights themselves, and i thought the amber light more odd than the triangle, because there was a chance that its a military stealth bomber. (by the way, we live very close to rickenbacker airport base, and there are flight pathes directly over our house, we get atleast 2-3 life flight helicopters a day, and a few fighter jets.) 

so, completely stunned, the first thing i want to do is tell someone what i just saw, and almost natrually i called my buddy who lives in tarlton, because he lives withen walking distance of me, so maybe he saw something too. i called him and told him what happened, then i drove to his house, and we sat outside in is backyard. we started to discuss possible explenations when the same type of triangle suddenly apperared from the east, doing the same random flashing thing the last object had done, except it seemed to slow down a couple of times and then started moving at a much faster pace. we watched it until we couldnt see it anymore as it was out of sight headed north west. we smoked a couple of cigarettes and started speculating as of what the hell we had just seen. 20 minutes passed when my friend got up to get us a couple of sodas when he blurted "holy [cms/tg/pd]! do you see that!?" and to the east there was a cigar shaped object slowly cruising with 3 red lights on the bottom, and 2 white lights on each end which looked to be from inside the object, sort of like observation ports that poured out light. then it zipped away at a much faster rate, atleas 4 times what it was originally going.

after a little more time had passed (this happened in less than 2 hours) we saw what looked like a blinking red light, like the kind that are on top of tall antenneaes moving from east to west slowly. it passed over us, and as it pulsed every second or so, there was a dim reflection of the object it was connected to, but it was... transparent i guess is the right word. it moved out on to the horizion to the west and started to blink more rapidly, then seemed to go down, then in a diaganial line then up and slowly faded from red to black. then 10 minutes after that there was a silver flash from the west behind some trees, and the light popped out then slowly dimmed like the red light.

we were awe struck. after it cooled down for 15 min. my friend got up and went to the bathroom, and right as he walked in a helicopter zoomed over heading south from north, flying quite low.
content.summary: 4 different objects seen in less than 3 hours, oddly followed by a low flying heliocopter

content.detailedDescription: Blue
content.summary: Hubble space telescope

content.detailedDescription: we were in the backyard and looked to the east and noticed a strip of white gold light just suspended in the sky...We couldn't tell the distance and it lasted only a few seconds..Then i saw a line below of light..Then it was gone...No movement.....The light was very well defined....We felt like we had seen something unnatural....Still in awe
content.summary: Strip of white light, bar like, with a thin line of light below, seemed suspended.

content.detailedDescription: this area in the bottoms beside the arkansas river dam is a major hot spot - major. i have more ufo reports including ribbons of light that looked like the one's in stephensville texas and kokomo indiana, we watched that thing for 50 minutes, we didn't leave till we felt it was safe. but this, my little brother (age 17) and me (age 23) were on a hill in the bottoms about to watch the stars. we notice some of them moving like we had never saw before... and we watch the stars every night now. we've seen thousands of satelights, meteors, even a few comets, and can pick out planets, we are not mistaking these, they are some type of space crafts flying in space. we saw one, it looked just like a star, they all did, different sized stars kinda. it was moving away from us and my little brother spotted another. then we saw another on comming in, and it was moving faster, then slower (there was no wind blowing, and again, they were in space as high as the stars are), not only faster and slower, but side to side, and stoping for extended periods. we counted about 16 and they were moving all around, everywhere. then we started noticing helicopters circling the bottoms and one came around and was circling us you could see his rutter kind've turning, so i took off to leave, and when i got back to my house 3 of 4 miles back, i noticed the same helicopter was going on ahead of my house, and my little brother told me the whole time he was following us. there is crazy things going on in arkansas, i don't know about the rest of america or the world... come on obama just let this knowledge out, how can we change the world with such secrets?????
content.summary: Multiple ufos flying, helicopters circling bottoms, def. ufos not planes or satelites.

content.detailedDescription: While driving in to work (night shift in downtown tulsa, ok) at 10:02pm on hwy. i-75 southbound (near 96th street exit) i saw a very bright "strip" of white or bluish white light in the sky to the east.  this is very close to the approach used for runways at tulsa international (rwy. 18l and 18r).  i am use to seeing planes approaching to land at the airport in tulsa, but this was not an airplane about to land at the airport.  it appeared (as best i can tell) to be about 1/4 mile to my east (no way to reference this distance, just a best guess).  it had a dark outline i could not identify well, but then lit up with a very bright strip of white light on it's bottom.  the light looked a bit like the expensive xenon headlights used by teenagers in the import cars, as it was almost blue tinted a bit.  maybe like a mercury vapor light, but much brighter.  it stayed on for about 3/4 of a second and went out, then back on for about 1/4 second.  then, as it was going dark, it started moving away (appeared to be eastbound, but was hard to tell).  as soon as the lights went out, i lost sight of it's dark outline and the sighting was over.  if i were to guess, i would say this strip of light was at least 100 feet long, but i could see no real shape except that the strip of light was a straight line below a darker craft.  when i saw it i immediately got a "fight or flight" feeling as adrenaline surged through me and i was awestruck and scared at the same time.  i continued the drive to work (no missing time on my commute) and sent this report.
content.summary: Large very bright bluish white "strip" of light seen on bottom of a large craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my vehicle when i noticed that there were 2 objects in front of me one was blinking yet the other was a aircraft beside it, then the unidentified object began to fly irratically and the zoom away, then the jet turned around and flew away, also i have seen approxiamtly 20 jets throughout the day.
content.summary: This was being followed by another aircraft, possible jet.

content.detailedDescription: I was working second shift at a federal defense plant in linthicum md and was giving someone a ride home and was traveling down marley neck road in a triumph spitfire with the top down on a quiet summer night.  i dropped my friend off at his house and proceeded to take the dark quiet road home.  the road i was traveling on was a one lane both ways with not alot of cars at that time of early morning of 2:00am.  i had the top down on my car because it was a pretty night after i got off work.  i was traveling on marleyneck road half point from b&a blvd and fortsmallwood road  and to my right was a field with a grove of trees and something caught my eye as i drove by and i hurried up to stop my car and then backed up to see a teardrop object hovering over the trees!!..At first i thought this can't be happening to me and i am seeing things, but it was very quiet and made a humming sound. there is no way a plane or heilocopter could hover over trees and not make any noise or wind being that close to the trees.   in the moonlight reflection it looked to be shinny silver, very upscale from anything that anyone could imagine.  i was there for about 5 minutes or so and it tilted at a slant and within seconds it was so far up in the air behind me, that it was just a small light in the sky. i kept my eyes on it until it was a dot in the sky and it finally disapeared. i could not believe my eyes on what i had seen that summer night.  i told my dad and mom and friends.  i have never ever forgotten about what i had experienced in my life and never will...
content.summary: Shiny, silver looking under the moonlight.

content.detailedDescription: Having just been picked up at work from a downtown st. louis hospital, sitting in the rear passenger seat i noticed a small dark object slowly moving in the sky. we were traveling south, and the object was in the southwestern sky. at first i thought it was a single small balloon filled with helium. stopped at a light, i could see a dark object seeming to rise and move to the front right of us, between a row a trees along the road. between 30 and 45 degrees in the sky from the ground, it appeared small, only the "diameter" of an 1/8th of inch. it seemed to be getting closer, but there was little wind, and what wind there was was moving in the opposite direction than the object was, which kept my attention on it. it then appeared to stop and hover or stay in place, clearly a perfect circle, but completely black with no lighting to it at all, reflected or otherwise. the sky was partly cloudy, the clouds high and thin, the object definitely beneath them. the object seemed to then "wiggle" back and forth, at least 3 times its diameter size to either side of its "hovering" position, then it started moving in a completely straight line to the west, not changing in "size" during it's move to the west-northwest location. sometimes the object would be blocked by trees or building as we drove or stopped at lights, but a vast majority of the time the object stayed in view. it seemed to stop once or twice along its southwest to north-northwest location, again "wiggling" each time. it "wiggled" again when it finally "stopped" in the west-northwest location. it seemed to "stay" in that location, but slowly grew smaller until i lost sight of it. even though it was a small size in significance to what is usually reported, its perfectly circular black shape made it seem more like a small moving black hole in the sky, and also going against the wind, and its very strange "wiggling" behavior - i don't know what can can travel "against" wind without sound and wiggle and have no reflected nor illuminated light?
content.summary: Small black circle moving in late afternoon sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was lookin at google sky and i found a ufo or something.
content.summary: I was lookin at google sky and i found a ufo or something.

content.detailedDescription: A coworker and i had just landed at sky harbor airport from seattle, rented a car and were approaching a freeway onramp (interstate 10?)to head for mesa. it was around 3:00pm, clear, sunny, and there was lots of traffic. my coworker was driving, i was the navigator, and i noticed straight ahead - maybe 2 miles away from the airport and a few hundred feet in the air - a rectangle in the sky, with mountains in the background.  i immediately assumed it to be an advertising banner being pulled by an airplane. still, it seemed out of place, it didn't appear to be moving, and i couldn't see an airplane pulling it (but because it was between us and the mountains, i figured i was unable to distinguish the plane from the terrain behind it) i pointed the object out to my coworker, she saw it too and remarked that it was odd. her focus though quickly returned to merging into freeway traffic. as i continued to observe the object, i assumed the plane pulling it must have turned to head directly away from us and towards the mountains, because the rectangle got thinner and thinner until it disappeared completely. i mean literally, seconds later there was no object, no airplane, nothing. i scanned the area for another minute or two as we drove, there was nothing there. i said, half-kidding, "that must have been a ufo!" the entire sighting was maybe 30 seconds.
content.summary: Strange rectangle in the sky disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east getting ready to get on the expressway and saw a bright object roughly one mile out and one half mile or so off the ground. it was too close to be a plane; it was not a bird. it kept bouncing from left to right and down then up and diagonal. it seemed to be changing shape as it would change speed from quick to slow. at one point it looked to be long and going vertical, then a bright light came from it, like it lite up but white-not like from the sun, but an illuminous light that came from the object itself. it was small and at times kept fading somewhat but not completely. the duration of the event was approximately 2 to 3 minutes. i almost wrecked the whole time.
content.summary: Small jolting object with bright light and mis-shapen/shape-shifting body.

content.detailedDescription:
I had been watching a movie, just put the kids to bed, and wandered outside to our detatched garage to see what my husband was up to.  i leaned down to pet the dog and then scanned the sky as i always do.  this is right around 9 pm on saturday may 9, 2009.

at that time, i saw a light in the sky that looked like a star but was much brighter, bigger, and closer than a star in the sky.  it was moving from the northern part of the sky southward.  i watched for the tell-tale blinking lights, like the wings of an airplane, but there was no fluxuation in the light.  after about 30 seconds of approaching from north to south, it turned eastward and gained in altitude.  it got smaller and smaller and about 15 seconds later it was obscured by a tree, so i went running to the front yard.  by the time i got to the front yard, it had disappeared.  there was also no sound with this object, definitely no plane engine sounds.

in fact, while typing this, i became concerned that what i had seen was actually a flight to dallas from our local airport, so i looked it up.  the evening flight leaves at 8 and i know it was at or a little after 9pm that i saw this object.

i did not feel afraid or nervous.  i was excited and hopeful that i was actually seeing something out of the ordinary.  i should have called my husband out to see it, but he had a friend over and i didn't want to seem weird.  

i kept scanning the sky for signs of it again, but it didn't return.
content.summary: Bigger and brighter than a star, closer than a star. moved faster than a plane, no flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was online talkin with my friend when my mom called and said she would be home soon.  as i was on the phone i was walking around the living room and looked out the window and noticed a large thin black cigar with a light gray stripe down the middle length-wise shaped object hovering in the sky it didn't move at all and i heard no noise.  i couldn't tell what the object was at first so i looked hard and still couldn't guess what the object was but it didn't look like any aircraft i had ever seen.   it had to be a few miles away but i would guess it was a few hundred feet long.  when i noticed i told my mom and friend but about 23 seconds after i noticed the object it just faded away.After that i didn't see anything else wierd.
content.summary: Black cigar.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just returned home from night class and parked my car about 1/2 block from my house. i was walking south on the left side of my street. 

i have a tendency to look up at the stars on clear nights to see if i can make out any constellations.  the skies were clear this evening.  i look up to the right and saw three stars, but then strangely, i noticed that one of the "stars" was moving.   the star-like object was moving east in a slow but constant speed and no sound.  slow enough for me to follow it as i walked to my house from my car.  

i don't live too far from o'hare airport so i see a lot of planes come and go all the time.  so when i saw this object moving slowly across the sky with no flashing lights like commercial airlines do...Then i knew this was not something normal.  in fact, as i was walking a plane happened to fly accross (going east)and that confirmed my suspicions.  the glowing star-like object seemed to be higher and moving slower than the plane. 

as i was getting closer to my house i was loosing sight of it because by this time it was over my head and descending east...So i was able to catch a glimpse through the spaces between houses.  by the time i got the alley next to my house i turned around and looked east and saw that the object curved and continued going in a northeast direction.  after that i lost sight of the object.  

i was in awe of what i was seeing that it didn't dawn on me to record it.  all i had with me was my phone, but even then i don't think my camera phone would have picked up something so high up in the dark sky.

i didn't what to make of what i saw.  i didn't say anything and thought maybe it's just my imagination, but it's been eating at me ever since just because i've never seen anything like it in my life.  i just don't know how one would explain what i saw especially when it was moving slower than a plane in a slow and steady pace.
content.summary: Star-like object moving slowly across chicago sky in eastern direction 5/11/2009.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 32 year old man that lives in vinings, atlanta, georgia.  on the twelfth of may 2009 at approximately 9:11 to 9:15 p.M. i went to my back porch to smoke a cigarette.  i looked up into the sky to see a normal traffic flow of commericial jet liners and one smaller somewhat low flying plane cross the sky.  
it was at that time that a somewhat large (what seemed to be a smaller commercial jet) that was flying at a very low altitude came into view on my left.  it was absolutely silent. at that moment, from tip to tail in one long red stripe that ran down its side it vanished above me as it disappeared out of view behind one large tree that sits off the left of my porch.  i know that was a long sentence but that is about how long this whole event took.  pretty quick.
as it vanished the red line that ran down its side seemed to glow briefly with more concentrated bright red light starting in the front and moving through it?  it is hard to describe. that is it.  i went back inside my apartment, told my roommate (who rolled his eyes) and felt like it was a pretty cool thing.  thank you.
content.summary: I watched a silent airplane vanish into thin air.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my car when a triangle object came from behind.  it beamed a very bright light, and then i passed out. the next thing i remember was that i was lying on a large white operating table thing, and this creature was standing over me. it looked kinda like that alien from predator, the movie. it put this large underwear on me, and began to conduct numerous tests on me. then it cut me balls off (but they used anestesia, because i couldn't feel it). then i passed out again, and when i woke up i was in my car naked. they had done a terrible thing to me.
content.summary: I was in my car when this big triangle ufo came and stopped. then i was abducted.

content.detailedDescription: i walked outside to smoke a cigarette when i noticed a ghostly white glowing object to my 2o'clock position in the sky.  it was a triangular craft w/ windows hovering in one spot.  once the glow started to fade away the object began moving.  after a few minutes another smaller object flew in and passed right by the slow cruising triangle craft.  this one pulsated a white light in the front and back very brightly.  after this one left the area the black triangle craft turned and started heading back towards me and my wife.  when it flew right over our heads is when i got the best shot of it on film.  i've seen this craft 6 times total in 3 years and during this week (i was outside 4 out of the 7 days) when this craft passed over.  i could really use a state of the art camera (like in ufo hunters) to get better shots of these 'things'.  i'm working on editing a daylight sighting i have on film of a black 'saucer' shaped craft that was filmed around 8:30 in the morning.  i will upload that one when i get done.  thanks.
content.summary: This craft flew over 4 times during the week. i caught it on camera twice.

content.detailedDescription:
Glen lyon perthshire, scotland uk 13th may 2009.

about 2207 bst the telephone rang but when i picked it up there was just a series of beeps. i dialed 1471 to see who rang but no number had been left.

at 2210 bst a bright white light appeared in the clear, moonless night sky heading west to east and descending. oddly i saw it as being round while the wife saw it as being triangular in shape and orientated vertically. the object was completely silent and left no vapour or smoke trail. there was no flashing aircraft beacon showing and no navigation lights. the objects track lay south of us; it may have been flying between the ben lawers range of mountains (munros) and the river lyon because as seen it appeared to pass behind bushes in this garden as it descended towards the east. if it had been further south over loch tay it would have had to have been at a considerable altitude as otherwise the ben lawers hill slope would have obscured it before it appeared to pass behind the bushes.

the prevailing wind has been from the east over the
last few days and so that ufo could not have been a balloon as it would
have had to travel upwind!! additionally, aircraft landing lights are very
directional and always shine directly along the flightpath (or track) the
aircraft is following and not across it so it can't have been landing
lights. another  aspect of the sighting was the incredibly steady speed at which the ufo flew, no plane is that steady.

at about 2230 bst i reported the sighting to central scotland police who said they would log the incident as a ufo sighting and pass details to the department dealing with sightings for subsequent relay to relevant aviation authorities.
content.summary: Unusual telephone event followed by sighting.

content.detailedDescription: It was just past midnight when my roommate and i went outside for a smoke.  we live 10 minutes south of the las vegas strip.  the night was beautiful and clear as the moon shined bright.  it wasn't more than 30 seconds into our smoke when i noticed a ball of light smoothly cruising straight for us.  the object was very bright, flying at an extremely high altitude. right away you could tell that this was not man made.  i called my girlfriend outside for a third pair of eyes.  her father is a pilot and she has grown up in and around planes all her life.  she exclaimed, "that is definitely not a plane."  as it cruised directly over our heads, glowing bright like a huge star, it maneuvered in one sharp-angled "s" shape.  it made quick movements right, left, right and then returned back to its original flight path.  i ran into the house,  grabbed the flip and filmed a video that does not do the sighting justice.  after about 3 minutes the ship had made its way to the outskirts of town, flying parallel with the 15 fwy. suddenly the bright light turned off.  amazingly, you could still see the ship cruising in the well lit vegas night.  about 60 seconds later, still following the same exact flight path, the ship started flashing different colors of white, green, blue, and red.  the flashing happened in random order and timing, as if it was communicating with something else.  in hind sight i wish we could have gotten better footage of the color changing pattern. every 20-30 seconds the ship would go dark as if it was receiving transmission, then back to a completely different set of flashing colors.  unfortunately we were not able to see the entire sky from our side yard, so we could not tell if there were any other ships at that time.  we were only able to see a narrow strip of the sky right above us, since our view was blocked by the neighboring houses.  the sighting lasted 11-12 minutes until it disappeared over the mountains on its way to visit california.  in posting this article i'm hoping that someone else has video of the color changes that they could share. i find it hard to believe that we were the only ones that witness such an obvious sighting as it flew directly over the city lights.
content.summary: Large bright light cruising at a smooth fast pace at extremely high altitude began signaling to something else with a code of speratic colorful flashes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting kennedy space center as a chaperone helping with a group of school kids on a field trip.  this was 2 days after the recent launch of the space shuttle.  after visiting kennedy space center we had taken the kids to the beach at a state park in the city of cape canaveral. we arrived at the beach at around 2:20-2:30pm or so.  i had taken my binoculars so i could keep a eye on the kids on the beach.  i had also taken a digital camera to take pictures on the trip.  while sitting in a chair on the beach watching the kids in the water at about 2:50pm i looked up in the sky and noticed a small shining object that appeared to be very, very high up. the object was straight up over me at about 11:15-11:30 o'clock position as i faced east toward the beach.  i first thought it was a jet flying very high, but after a few moments i realized the object was not moving, or if moving, moving very, very slow.  i looked at it through my binoculars and the object was still very small even when looking at through the binoculars. even though small, i could make out a shape.  the object was whitish in color and was circle shaped.  there appeared to be a very,very thin faint layer of a dark color around the outer edges of the circle.  it appeared a little thicker on the side away from the sun, but this dark layer may have been as a result of a visual illusion.  also it  appeared that on the top there was a faint image of something protruding up away from the main body of the object, however, i can't be sure here.  it was too hard to see any specifics other than the obvious circle shape and whitish color. i looked at it for a minute or so trying to see if i could make out what it was.  it just sat there.  i then set my binoculars down and picked up my digital camera to try and take pictures of it. the object was so tiny in the sky it took me a moment or two to find it again.  this happened each time i took my eyes off it. once i found it again, i tried to get it in my view finder of the camera, but it was so small i could not make it out through the camera.  so i started taking pictures blind just guessing when to take the picture. i would take a couple of pictures then put the camera down and look at it again through the binoculars.  it stayed the same shape, color and size.  for about 10 minutes i would take a couple of pictures then look at it through the binoculars, take more pictures and look through the binoculars again.  i then alerted the teacher and a couple of the other parents about the object.  they each saw it and wondered what it was.  i asked the teacher, who had a 35mm camera with a telephoto lenses, to see if she could find it in her view finder and take some shots of it.  i then sat back down in my chair and continued to look at it with my binoculars. i knew the resolution of my digital camera was set on the lowest resolution and i wanted to set it on the highest resolution for a better image.  i did not know how to change the resolution on my camera so i called a friend who owned a similar camera and asked how to change the resolution.  my phone records indicated that i made this call at 3pm.  he told me how to changed the resolution and i did it while on the phone with him.  after changing the resolution i took a few more pictures.  since i could not tell if i was getting the object in the picture or not i zoomed in and out taking pictures hoping i would get lucky and get a clear close-up shot while shooting blind, but zoomed out so to make sure i covered a large area to make sure it was in a shot.  while i was taking pictures with the higher resolution, an elderly lady came up to me and said she had been watching me and wanted to know what i was looking at and taking pictures of.  i told her it was a very small object that looked similar to the size of a large star.  i tried to show her, but she gave up quickly and said "if you say so, i can't see it" and left. i then looked at the teacher to see what she was doing and she had sat her camera down and was looking at the kids in the water.  i asked her if she had taken photos of it and she said she could not find it in her camera.  i asked her if i could try and she said "sure, but the camera does not focus on its own".  i got her camera and sat back down and tried to find the object in the view finder of her camera. it was at this moment that i noticed that the object had been moving.  it was now at about a 11:45 position.  i had a point of reference because i had been laying me head back on the back rest of the chair each time i took a picture or look at the object with binoculars. now as i laid my head on the back of the chair i had noticed i had to look more straight up.  the object had been moving to the west inland and a little south, but mostly west.  there were several thunderstorms around on the north and south of me and they all were moving to the east.  this made me decide that the object was not a weather balloon for if it was it would also have been be moving east. after working with the 35mm camera for a minute or so, i was able to find the object for a second in the view finder, but it was blurry and moving around a lot in the view finder and hard to hold within the view finder.  i then decided to pre-focuse the camera so all i had to worry about was finding the object in the view finder and taking the picture without having to worry about focusing.  i decided to focus on a boat way off in the distance which best represented the size of the object. this took only 10-15 seconds to do.  i then looked back up and tried to find the object again, but it was gone.  while looking around to find it again, after a few seconds a commercial jet appeared from behind my left shoulder going east in the direction of and nearing where the object had been. however, the path of the jet took it a little to the left(north) of where the object was.  after looking for the object for a few more moments and not being able to see it i then tried to take pictures of the commerical jet for a reference point in case i did get pictures of the object and for and additional proof.  i put down the 35mm camera and tried to take pictures of the jet with my digital camera, but like the object, i unable to find the jet in my view finder. i took a couple of photos anyway again guessing where to shoot.  the jet did not appear to be at a high cruise altitude, in fact, i thought it may be still climbing. it was not leaving a trail.  i actually thought the object was much higher than this jet, but can't say for sure.  the smallness of the object may have played tricks on me. shortly after trying to take pictures of the jet i looked at the cell phone clock and it was 3:19pm.  the object did not re-appear.  i kept looking until we left the beach and the park at 3:39pm.

the day was partly cloudy with scattered thunderstorms around. in the area of the object the sky was 95% blue with a very small amount of very thin clouds.

after uploading the digital pictures i was disappointed to see that i had only one image showing the object.  amazingly it was the very first picture i took.  i missed the jet all together.

at some point, but i can't tell you precisely when in this outline, i looked at my cell phone to record a time as to when i was seeing the object and it was 3:11.

while typing this i had the thought that this object may indeed be a weather balloon that nasa sets lose prior to a launch to check the weather. however, two things cause me to cancel this thought. 1) the object moved west when thunderstorms were moving east. 2) after my looking at the object for over 25 minutes, the object disappeared in a matter of seconds.

i wish i had been looking at the object when it disappeared to see if it zipped off or just vanished in thin air.
content.summary: Ufo was some what stationary at approx 11:30 position very, very high up.  disappeared when jet came near.

content.detailedDescription:
The starlike object was moving in a north west direction. the object was dim and hard to see. the object moved in a straight line at a slow steady speed and then vanished or seemed to dim out.

i was walking my dog across the golf course as i do every night between 8pm to about 8:30 pm. i was looking for it (star-like objects)as they are a common occurance in this area. i picked up the hobby of star gazing about a year ago, bought a telescope. it was at that time that my girlfriend observed the star-like objects and pointed them out to me. it's been my hobby ever since then.

my feelings are that i know that the star like objects are ufo's and that they are piloted by life more advanced than ours. i was airforce and now i am a retired peace officer. we are not alone lol. ufo's are cool.
content.summary: I was walking across the golf course and observed a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the beach with my camera and then some pelicans were flying on top of me, i took several pictures, later when i down load them in my computer this is what i saw....The time difference between the two pictures was only about fraction of a second.
content.summary: A large cigar shape appears out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription:
Hellow all,                                           
since 1997 i've been observing ufo's in the night sky's.
most of these sightings have been spotted with the use of hi power binoculars. these objects are so high you can't see them with the naked eye. to this day 5/13/09,i have spotted at least 1000 (yes that is correct 1000!!).The first time i saw one i was blown away. now i can't stop looking at the sky. iwanted to get a better look at what i was looking at so i bought a pair of super hi power binoculars. what i discovered was that there are even more hi flying ufo's up there, my guess
is at least 500,000 feet. you just can't see them with the naked eye.
i'm sure many of you have seen these little lights moving across the sky,
and i urge you to get a pair some good binoculars because what i saw next
is the whole reason i'm writing this report. about two weeks ago i was outside in the backyard of my house hoping to spot more of these little
lights moving across the sky. got more than i wished for. 3 (three) small
little lights about the size of a far-away star were moving across the sky at a very slow speed. they were traveling from the south moving northwards. their formation was one in the front then one following behind and to the right and the third following further behind and to the left. suddenly the one following at the end picked up speed and moved in closer to the group but was still behind the second. how it picked up speed was amazing. at first it gota very bright glow and in a split second
moved form the very back to right behind the group then suddenly stop glowing as bright and back to its normal glow. i was blown away all my hairs were standing on end. i knew exactly what i was looking at. they kept traveling northward until they disappeared through my binoculars.
i'm now saving up money to buy a super hi power telescopic camera to send
these ufo pictures to the world. i only hope to be as lucky and see another group or formation of ufo's as i did that night. the world will finally have some genuine proof that we are not alone. 
                                                         your friend,
 for more info email me at miguelbarron72@yahoo.Com      miguel barron
content.summary: 3 ufos traveling across  night sky.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed opaque round sphere floating in the wind approximately one quarter mile high above ground. direction of object was heading due north of saint louis city in florissant area. the speed of the object was swift, approximately forty miles per hour.
content.summary: Floating sphere in the wind.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out casually looking at the stars the night of 5/11/09 because it was an exceptionally clear night and i could see quite of few stars. the big dipper was straight above and that is when i noticed what i thought was a satellite going accross the sky in nearly an east to west direction. (satellites are normally hard to see at my location because of light pollution.) no sooner did i thought "cool, there's a satellite", i saw another trailing it. as soon as the first one went out of sight, another one appeared in nearly the same trajectory. then it happened again and again for about 6 or 7 times. i thought, "whoa, this is weird". i called a friend (that's when i looked at the time) and told him what i saw, but i didn't see anything after that event.

it's hard to describe the separation distance between the objects, but for comparison sake i would estimate it to be about the distance of the bucket opening of the big dipper

i know that this isn't the way satellites are supposed to orbit, but i don't know what else the objects could be. the speed of the objects were going at the customarily speed of satellites i'm used to seeing. i didn't think they could be shooting stars because they weren't the right light intensity, speed, and they didn't leave a tail. there was no blinking lights, and they appeared to be quite high in the sky, so i don't think they could have been planes. 

after describing my story to a few friends, i was informed of some other ufo events in our area. i read about them, but what those stories desribed is not what i saw. i was hoping someone had a similar sighting.

sorry, no photos. i don't know if that was even possible unless i had high quality equipment.
content.summary: Multiple streaming satellites.

content.detailedDescription:
2009 05/13
these notes are just for me.  they are not intended for others to see or judge me by. please forgive me for writing down these observations.  i am a hard working man focused on making a living for my wife and family.  i do not make things up.  the observations i am writing about actually happened to me.  i was never going to write about them, but then today i decided to make a few quick notes about my experiences.  i have two college degrees in science and have worked in the medical field for over 30 years.
about 10 yrs ago, i lived with my wife in an upstairs apartment. i was the only one home that day. it was a spring day at about 10 am.  i went to the bathroom and as i was leaving the bathroom, a bright orange object shot by me faster than my eyes could follow it.  it was about the size of a dime (0.25��� diam), it came from my left(east to west) (bathroom window sill on left is about 5��� above floor and window was open) and went to my right at about shoulder height (decending at an angle of 10 deg toward the floor).  when i looked to the right to follow the object, it was gone in less than a split second and all i could see was the closed bathroom door. needless to say, i was startled; the object came within 1 ft of me.  my eyes only gazed at the closed door for a second and since there was nothing to see, my eyes returned to the center (normal position).  then, to my surprise, the orange ball streaked back in the opposite direction (to my left going west to east) toward the bathroom window.  again it went so fast that my eyes couldn���t follow it.  i looked to my left and it was gone. 
the incident shook me up. i have to admit that i was frightened and shaking for a few minutes. i immediately went to the bathroom window and looked down and up.  there was no one down below, all the surrounding buildings were only one story, (so no one from another building could be playing a prank on me with a laser pointer), and there were no airplanes or helicopters in the sky above. i left the bathroom and looked around the apartment and noticed that all the the windows had the drapes closed. i immediately ran outside the building and looked around.  no one was there.  i wanted to knock on doors and ask neighbors if they saw anything, but i stopped myself.  i would have made a fool out of myself.  
i calmed myself down, i had a busy day of work ahead of me.  i tried to convince myself that i was just seeing things that weren���t really there (an optical illusion or a malfunction of my optic nerve, or brain).  but, the fact that the object came back and went the other way made me think it was real.  still, to this very day i refuse to speculate on what it could have been.  the only thing i know for sure,is it did occur, and i try not to think about it.  i am only writing this down for my own notes about life.  about how things happen to people that can���t be explained.
i had this same bazaar experience a few weeks later, while i was walking out of my bedroom  in the hall between the bathroom, bedrooms and living room.  the orange ball flashed by me at about shoulder height. i can���t remember the exact direction it came from, but i do remember it was a different direction than the event in the bathroom.  i don���t remember if it went in front of me and then came back the other way as it did in the bathroom.  it occurred at about the same time (around 10:00 am).  the hall was dimly lit as all the drapes were closed.  i was the only one home.  i was startled but not as scared as the previous time.  i looked around inside and outside the apartment as and found no one or nothing out there.  
i even went to get my eyes checked after these experiences.  the doctor told me that a detached retina would be a blinding flash of white light over my entire visual field.  so this anomaly was not caused by a detached retina.  i don���t fantasize or make up stories to entertain myself so this was not the result of that.  in fact, i wish i had not experienced these events. nevertheless, it did open my mind to the possibility that there are things going on around us that we may not be totally aware of.
nothing like this ever happened to me before or since then.  it has been more than ten years since i observed this anomaly.  i was too busy to write down what happened at that time and i really shouldn���t be taking the time to write about it now.  i didn���t want to scare my wife, so i didn���t tell her what happened until a month later.  i just wanted to know if she had encountered anything like this.  she told me she had not seen or heard anything unusual.  at first she thought i was joking, but when she realized i was serious, she became frightened.  i calmed her down by telling her since nothing bad had happened to us, there was nothing to worry about.  this experience, changed the way i look at the real world.  it made me ask myself many questions:
���	what if the orange ball that flashed past me would have me hit me?  would it have damaged my body?  what if it had already hit me on another occasion and i didn���t know it?
���	why did i see it?  (i do not believe i was chosen to see it, or there was a message to me in seeing it, i think it was just a random event) why did it flash by and then come back the way it came?  why did i experience this anomaly twice?  it is pointless to speculate on the causes of this anomaly, so i try to put it out of my mind, but something tells me i should record these events.
���	have other people encountered anything like this?
���	what other things are going on that people observe, but dismiss them as illusions, or say to themselves, ���what i just saw couldn���t have happened, so i must be seeing things.��� or people might think to themselves, ��� it didn���t really happen, so i should just forget about it.  i better not tell anybody else about it, because they will think i am weird or crazy.���
content.summary: Light flashed by man at close range.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a mufon investigator (bob fiske) filing this report for the witness who does not have a computer. witness related the following to me about her sighting.
she woke up about 4:30 am and noticed bright flashing lights in the sky through her bedroom window, which faces to the north. the window was dirty so she went outside to the landing between the first and second floors of the unit and observed a disc shaped craft to the northwest, north of i-70 taht was flashing red orange white and blue lights around the perimiter. she estimated its size at arms length as to the second joint on her index finger, perhaps one and one half to two inches. at one point the craft dropped a diamond shaped satellite object with red white and blue lights that descended to the ground. she saw the disc depart at high speed to the northwest and when it did a twin rotor helicopter came into view from the west. helicopter may have been out of the army high altitude training center at the eagle county airport some 20 miles west. i called the center and spoke with the co who said they did not have any aircraft up that early. i have known the witness for two months and she is very creditable.
content.summary: Witness woke up at around 4:30 am and noticed flashing lights to the northwest. she went outside and saw a disc hovering which at one point dropped a diamond shaped satellite object that descended to the ground.

content.detailedDescription: Lying on bed watching tv. caught sight out of my eye. went over to the window and watched cross the sky.Ballon at first until it moved west about 100mph at a constant altitude obviously not a ballon from this point. felt shocked and unrealistic. object continued until appeared out of sight.
content.summary: Egg shaped object moved in straight line at same altitude into the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I go outside every night before i go to bed. last night at about 9:15 pm i was outside facing south looking up in the sky. it was just past dusk so it was what i consider dark outside and there were a few low clouds above me at that time. i gazed to the wsw and noticed an unusually bright white-bluish light traveling eastward. it was not a plane of any kind, or a helicopter or blimp. it was not a balloon, it was its own light source. it made no noise. i followed it as it skimmed a cloud, it was very slightly obscured but it did not have any directional beam of light. what i mean is when airline lights hit clouds or fog, you can see the beam of the light. with this object there was no beam visible. there were no other visible lights and no blinking lights. the object did not change shape as it passed over. it was simply a very very bright whitish blue light flying below the cloud ceiling silently from west to east and i watched it until it went behind the tree line out of my line of vision. i do live in flight paths of commercial , oregon air guard, and private small aircraft. i live east of the portland international airport (pdx) and east of the troutdale airport for many years and i am very familiar with the aircraft and air traffic patterns in my area and this was out of the norm of anything i am used to hearing or seeing. i have never seen anything like it in my life. it was not a celestial event or anomaly either. the speed was fairly slow i cannot even guess how fast it was flying, and i do not know if anyone else witnessed either. from when i first saw the object it was the same and did not change, the light remained constant. i could not distinguish any shape. this object was brighter than anything else i have ever seen in the sky. it was not a flare of any kind. it was its brightness and the color of the light that made me notice it, it stuck out and immediately i knew it was something unusual that i had never seen before. my feelings and thoughts were,"[cms/tg/pd], what is that?! figure's no one is here to examine it with me and my camera is in the house. this all happened in about 35 to 50 seconds.
content.summary: Extremely bright white-blue light silently flying west to east below the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I am a mufom investigator living in vail and was a my job as a security officer for the vail valley medical center. i was in a stairwell at the west end of the hospital and there is a window that faces north on the landing between the second and third floors. i was watching the sky for a few minutes as there had been a number of ufo reports in the area when i noticed this white cigar shaped object moving from west to east at about 30 degrees of elevation. ufo was about three quarters of an inch long at arms length and i could not see any wings or tail assembly on the craft. as it went to the east it entered a small cloud and i felt i should have seen it come out the other side but did not. i did notice an aircraft with a single contrail further to the north and above and behind the ufo that may have been a jet fighter. i guess i had some difficulty realizing what i saw but i did see a similar cigar shaped craft on march 19th, 2004 when i was out in the parking lot at the hospital that traveled the same course. it was during a time when there was a lot of sighting reports out here and i had a sighting the previous day which i reported to mufon. in both cases the cigar shaped craft reminded me of video shot in salida in 1995 that was recently shown on one of the ufo hunters shows.
content.summary: Bright white cigar shaped crossed sky to the north of vail. entered small cloud and did not come out other side.
